title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 66-1.5 - Immunization records from previous schools
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 66-1.5 - Immunization records from previous schools

State Regulations

An immunization record forwarded from the child's previous school, which contains all of the information specified in subdivision (a) of section
66-1.3
of this Subpart, may be accepted by the principal or person in charge of the school in lieu of a certificate of immunization. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
66-1.5

Amended, New

York State Register February 19, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 7, eff. 7/1/2014

Amended

New

York State Register August 26, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 34, eff. 9/1/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
